analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyis rlom sems su mi byed /

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems su mi byed /

translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, when great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom are endowed with this attainment of the transcendent perfection of generosity, they do not consider the transcendent perfection of generosity.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of tolerance.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not consider the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol phyin pa bdag gi zhes rlom sems su @368b mi byed /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed na /

translated: They do not consider the transcendent perfection of generosity as a self.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline as a self.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of tolerance as a self.

translated: They do not consider the transcendent perfection of wisdom as a self.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of generosity as a sentient being.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline as a sentient being.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of tolerance as a sentient being.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of perseverance as a sentient being.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration as a sentient being.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of wisdom as a sentient being.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of generosity as a life.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline as a life.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of tolerance as a life.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of perseverance as a life.

analyzed: sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed do //
translated: They do not consider the transcendent perfection of generosity as an individual.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline as an individual.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of tolerance as an individual.🔽They do not consider the transcendent perfection of perseverance as an individual.

translated: if bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom🔽do not falsely project the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities,🔽do not falsely project because of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities,
